description: This file defines the HomePage component for a React application. It serves as a public landing page with call-to-action buttons, information sections, and a demo snapshot card, using various UI components and React hooks.

methods.name: HomePage()
methods.description: React functional component rendering the home/landing page with navigation and authentication-aware content.

methods.name: onGetHelp
methods.description: Event handler navigating to either '/submit' or '/login' depending on the user's authentication status.
